review_neg: The Location is excellent and is the main reason we continue to use this hotel.
review_text: 103.8525189 The Location is excellent and is the main reason we continue to use this hotel.
review-score: The airconditioning was not efficient in the original part of the hotel. The newer section is much more efficient. Also our family ordered a special bottle of champagne to be delivered to our room ( for our Golden Wedding anniversary) and it did not arrive.
